text:
I needed to derive my own class from Project.  This was fine as long as my code
created the project instance but when I wanted to use the antcall task, there
was no way to tell ant to use my class instead of the default since the code
that creates the project instance uses a hardcoded class name.

Created attachment 5278
patch to allow user to specify project class via cmd line option
creator: walters@edge.net

text:
In CVS HEAD the Ant task calls a new method on Project, createSubProject().  By
default this method returns an instance of the main Project's type (if a no-arg
constructor is available).  If by chance your Project subclass does not use a
no-arg constructor, you can always override the implementation of
createSubProject().
creator: mbenson@apache.org
